Package my.startegy.cards

Interface CardDealingStrategy

public interface CardDealingStrategy
It is a strategy of dealing cards for a card game. Each game defines how many cards should be dealt to a player and what additional card stacks should be dealt as well.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<Card>> dealStacks​(Deck deck, int players)
    It's result of it is a Map containing named card stacks (as Lists).

  • Method Details

    • dealStacks

      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<Card>> dealStacks​(Deck deck, int players)
      It's result of it is a Map containing named card stacks (as Lists). Each player's stack has a name on its number: "Player 1", "Player 2", and so on. Additional stacks varies from game to game. The rest of the card deck becomes a "Remaining" stack.
      Parameters:
      deck - Our deck.
      players - Players which play.
      Returns:
      It's result of it is a Map containing named card stacks.
